body:
I played Tristana and got an S yesterday, and I was happy cause it was my first S, but how does going 4/1/2 get me an S? My cs was 67, and I helped get one tower and a dragon. Please elaborate, and look at my match history if you want to check.


??????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????? {{champion:18}}

replies.body:
I get scores on Azir that are negative and get S's xD

Meanwhile other champs get scores like 18/3/12 and get A
Not really sure of the answer to your question, just wanted to mention that PD isnt always the best choice on trist, RFC and Stattik are normally better choices. :D
yeah, my irl friend who's full of himself tells me to build Phantom Dancer on her for some reason, i was gonna buy RFC but my friend is just like "dude it doesnt do shit on her", so yeah :P
